about_the_game:
Leaving the ravages of war in your homeland behind, you and a few others have ventured north into the forgotten lands. Here you have made camp in a secluded place to found a new town, Freestead. Here, everyone shall be free and there will be no noble lord to profit from your hard labor.

In this medieval fantasy world, you have to build up your fortifications to defend against the Korrgai raiders who come to take what little you have. See how long you can survive against the unrelenting hordes of invaders. Your enemies will grow in strength and numbers over time and you have to do your best to protect your camp as long as possible.

Experiment to find the best strategies and use the surrounding rocks to your advantage.

content_descriptors.notes: The game revolves around defending your village from invaders. Your towers shoot projectiles at the enemies to kill them. When enemies die, they leave corpses that are gone after a few seconds. No depictions of blood or dismemberment.
